text: "Killer Queen" is a song by British rock group Queen. It was featured on their 1974 album Sheer Heart Attack, and also appears on, Greatest Hits. When released as a single, "Killer Queen" was Queen's breakthrough hit. It reached number two in the United Kingdom and number 12 in the United States.Joel Whitburn (2006). The Billboard Book of Top 40 Hits. Billboard Books Musicians: * Freddie Mercury - lead and backing vocals, piano, jangle piano * Brian May - electric guitar, backing vocals * Roger Taylor - drums, triangle, chimes, backing vocals * John Deacon - bass guitar == References == Category:Queen (band) songs Category:1974 songs Category:5 Seconds of Summer songs Category:Glam rock songs Category:Power pop songs Category:Art pop songs
title: Killer Queen
